attributes.action: Revise stamp duty to 1.5% up to £250,000 and 3% above that, rather than 3% on the total amount
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would create a more fair stamp duty system, as in areas of the UK £250,000 will not buy very much, the lowering of duty on the amount to £250,000 would assist those on lower income to enter the housing market.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=stamp+duty+
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
